member.name: T:PixelCompetitionServerLib.PixelCompetitionClientHandler
member.summary: Main class to handle a client session against the server, it is initialized by the server on demand and uses ICompetitionFactories to instantiate an ICompetition for each client.

member.name: T:PixelCompetitionServerLib.PixelCompetitionServer
member.summary: Server starting TCPListener and start a client handler for each connection. This class should be instatiated by using a .
